original_title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 3: Skapa
overview: Of all the difficulties facing artists, sustaining creativity seems to be the hardest. Inspiration comes and goes with the wind, seemingly out of nowhere. One of the hardest parts about creating a concept album in a short amount of time was making sure that I stayed inspired and kept creating.
tagline: Cat"a*clasm\ n. A breaking asunder; a violent disruption.
title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 3: Skapa
